Text:
(Midgar Kingdom is a world-famous metropolis that
houses over one million people.)

(Having turned fifteen, I've enrolled in the Midgar
Academy for Dark Knights in the capital which
my big sister also attends.)

(This academy is known as the crème de la crème of
schools on our continent where promising knights
gather not only from this nation but all over the
world.)

(Being the medieval hierarchical society that this
world is, even an extra character like me gets to
attend the school.)

(That said, I do literally get the side character
treatment here.)

(We country bumpkins are herded off to live in the
cheap downtown apartments.)
Sorry to keep you guys waiting!
'Sup. What's with the hair?
We'll be late, Cid.
Yeah, sorry, sorry...

(I've chosen pure background characters, true extras,
Skel and Po as my friends.)

(Skel is the slim and tall second son of Baron Etal
and Po is the short and stocky second son of Baron
Tato.)
(They're perfect background character material.)
Hurry up!
Wait, I'm coming!

Damn it. I wish they'd put us in the dorms up on the
cliff like the higher-ranking aristocrats.

There's no place for us third-rate nobles where the
likes of princesses live.

If only I were an elite student like my sister, I'd
be able to live in those dorms.

You? A championship candidate for the Bushin
Festival? Dream on.
Ahaha...

(It's been seven months since the beginning of
school. I've kept my grades on the lower-mid
tier to blend in with the crowd.)

(As I settle into my role as a background student,
I find myself faced with the momentous battle of
a lifetime.)

By the way, you haven't forgotten the dare for
whoever scored the lowest in yesterday's magic
equivalency test, have you?
We're holding you to your word.
Yeah, yeah.

(This "dare" is to ask out and get brutally rejected
by the most popular girl in school.)
(I can't think of a role more fitting for an extra!)
//ムービー再生
Hey, hey! You better not chicken out now.

Don't worry. I stayed up all night preparing how
I'll confess my love to her.

(I mean, I get it. I'm guessing she's got a political
marriage or something lined up for her when she
graduates. I bet she isn't interested in silly games.)

(That said, the aristocratic students who have
confessed their love to her share the same
fate—political marriage and all.)

(I guess that's why they want to have a little fun
while still in school. Well, it doesn't matter either
way. In the end, it's simply the amusement of
those who know nothing of the shadow realm.)

(And it's my duty as a background character to join
in on this charade.)

(To get brutally rejected by the most popular girl in
school? I can't think of a role more fitting for an
extra.)

(If I can get through this and play the role of a
real loser,)

(I will have taken another step toward becoming a
shadowbroker.)
(Which brings us to the schoolyard.)
(I face Princess Alexia from a distance.)

(Her platinum hair is cut straight across at her
shoulders, and her red eyes are almond-shaped
and, um, pretty?)

(And she looks all aloof with her perfect face.
It's like, "Yeah, yeah, we get it already. You're
gorgeous. Yeah, whatever.")

(I hate to break it to you, but I'm bored of beautiful
women thanks to Alpha and the others. I prefer a
touch of ugliness. It makes you unique, you know?)

(What should I say? How should I confess to her...?
This is gonna be the greatest love confession by a
minor character of all time.)
(I stayed up all night to prepare for this moment.)

(Choosing the right words is a given. But I stayed up
all night researching articulation, tone, and pitch.)

(I finally mastered the ultimate confession. On this
day, at this very moment, I'm standing on the
battlefield of a lifetime.)
(I am ready for this fight.)
(It's a momentous battle for a background character.)

(Sure, shadowbrokers have their own battles to fight,
but fighting as a minor character is something else
entirely.

(Which means I'm gonna pull out all the stops as
one.)

(I'm secure in my resolve when I turn toward her.
Princess Alexia...)

(She's standing there looking all high-and-mighty,
but I could unsheathe my sword and detach her
neck from her torso in a heartbeat.)

(Watch closely. I present to you, the greatest
love confession in the world!)
Pwi...
Pwinshesh A-A-A...Alexia.

(Did you hear how I stuttered on the "A-A-A"? And
that staccato? I threw in a bit of pitch,)

(changed tone midway through and added a lisp to
"Princess" to give a convincing performance.)
I...I-I love you...!

(I lower my eyes to evade her gaze, making sure my
knees are knocking against each other.)
W-Will you...b-b-be my g-g-girlfriend...?

(I choose to go with your average confession—cliché
if not boring. But I let my pitch and tone go crazy.)

(And that upward lilt at the end? It shows my
complete lack of confidence.)
(It's perfect...!)

(This is the performance of my dreams. I'm satisfied!
I'm completely satisfied!)

(Now, all I've got to do is get rejected by her, then
trip and fall as I make my exit...)

(I'm pleased with myself and just about to leave when
I experience an auditory hallucination.)
Sure.
Huh?
I said...sure.
Err...ummm.
What did you just say?
I've been waiting for someone like you.
I'm sure we'll be great together.
Uh, yeah.
Huuuhhhhh?!
When did I become the protagonist of a romcom?!
So...how is he?

He's entered Midgar Academy for Dark Knights as
planned.

I see. I wonder if he intends to make a move anytime
soon...

I'm not sure. By the way, I'm curious about something.
We recently conducted an undercover investigation
of a tavern in the north district...

It was just an ordinary tavern, according to the
report.

Since one of our newcomers conducted the
investigation, I asked Sigma to reinvestigate
just in case. Sure enough, she discovered a
hidden passage leading underground.
One of the Cult's hideouts...

Thinking back, I believe I saw Master Shadow looking
toward the tavern when he was out the other day.
He must've noticed as well. Let's investigate.
Will you go yourself, Lady Alpha?

You're coming with me. We must uncover what it is
he's thinking.

This hideout connects to the labyrinth under the
capital.
There's a faint chemical smell...
I wonder if they're experimenting on the possessed.
Lady Alpha, there are guards.

Keep hidden as we advance. We don't want them
destroying evidence.

Indeed. They seem to burn everything these days as
soon as they get wind that we're onto them.
It goes to show how on edge they are.
Is this...an underground church?

Looks like they were using it as a lab although
they've since abandoned it.

But they've left documents behind. It seems they were
researching some type of pill and experimenting on
living subjects.
Experimenting on the possessed...

Test subject #226 Lena...#227 Millia... This is where
they were conducting their experiments.

They've left behind the cages where they kept the
possessed, but they've taken all the important
documents.

They may be close to completing their research.
Shadow must've anticipated the battle that lies
ahead...
Should we get Delta?
Yes. We could use the extra firepower.
An alarm system! What should we do, Lady Alpha?

Not to worry... I planned on destroying this place
anyway.
